  • How To Reach Me

Dewanshu Pratihar

Web Developer & Music Producer

Organisations in all fields of business ache for attention. Flailing and wailing to seek customer’s approval amongst the fierce competition. Keeping up with the age has never been so imperative a task.

The vastness of this internet space is incomprehensible and establishments that tapped into its potency have seen their organisations not only grow, but truly thrive.

The website you are browsing through, floats in this ocean deep. As a newcomer to these uncharted waters, we shall help you float your boat, for we know this vastness from in and out.

Help us, Help you.

You’ve felt it too. Looking around, at others or perhaps within, a fleeting glimpse in altered human emotions. The sound so good, you might even call it aural enlightenment.

Masterfully crafted audio is a conduit for the creator with the sole purpose of kindling or stirring emotions in ourselves. A skillset that demands decades of experience to grasp, comprehend and possibly apply in our own craft.

We wouldn’t dare claim to have acquired such a mastery, but our journey has certainly begun. As we work on varied projects, time passes and shadows lengthen, we feel we’re closing the distance, and dream of perhaps feeling that sweet taste of victory someday.

Therefore, we ask. Yet again,

Help us on our journey, while we help you on yours.
